description: gray outlined heart icon in the comment action bar, located between thumbs down and three-dot menu

metadata.thought: The task requires me to locate the gray outlined heart icon within the comment action bar. Upon examining the screenshot, I can see that there are several comments displayed under the main post. Each comment has an action bar with various interactive icons. Among these icons, I notice a heart-shaped icon located between the thumbs down and three-dot menu icons for each comment. This heart icon is gray in color, which matches the description provided.
